result.title: GOI â€” A new Olympiad in Informatics contest website
result.content:
Hello.

GOI is a new OI contest website.

Scoring system is like IOI and a lot of programming contests will take place there.

Every contest will have 3 problems with some subtasks and the duration will be 5 hours.Problem statements will be published in English and Persian (and more, if you want).

For more information, go to GOI official site.

If you had any question, any offer or proposal or even you want to work for GOI or hold contest there, use Contact us page or website admin's email (admin@goi.1gh.in) .

UPD: Thanks Pashmak(matrix) for testing our website.
